DOC.brief_title: Determining Potential Wholegrain Wheat Rye Improve Gut HealTh
DOC.detailed_description: A dietary intervention study design randomize , control , parallel intervention 6-weeks duration . A total 75 participant include study randomly allocate one three intervention ( refine wheat , whoelgrain wheat wholegrain rye ) . The randomization stratify accord sex sex-specific median habitual cereal dietary fibre intake ( 16g/d men 13g/d woman ) . The randomization do mean randomization generator webpage ( http : //www.randomization.com ) . Recruitment randomization take place continuously study period , therefore randomization do mixed block randomization . During intervention study , participant instruct substitute cereal product ( e.g . bread , breakfast cereal , pasta ) diet provide study product . The amount provide study product match average intake carbohydrate-rich product Danish population , correspond ~200g bread cereal product per day . The participant eat study product ad libitum manner b instruct avoid cereal diet include cake , biscuit , ready make meal fast food exception White rice whis allow 1-2 time per week . Clinincal examination include anthropometric assessment , fecal , urine fastign blood sampling , dietary assessment meal challenge do ( week 0 ) ( week 6 ) intervention . At timepoints week 0 , 2 , 4 6 questionnaire fill concern satisfaction diet gastrointestinal symptom .
DOC.criteria: • Age : 30 65 year Body mass index ( BMI ) : 25 32 kg/m2 Weight stable ( < 3 kg weight change last 6 month ) Apparently healthy Informed consent sign Freezer capacity 2 week bread provision Can attend visit require study • Smoking daily basis Lactating ( lactate within 6 week prior study start ) , pregnant ( pregnant within 3 month prior study start ) wish become pregnant study Diagnosed form diabetes CVD Reported chronic GI disorder Antibiotic treatment 3 month study start study Use pre probiotic 1 month study start study Lack cooperation adherence protocol Use prescription medication evaluate individual basis
